name: MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters
desc: Parameters that affect the training process of an action classifier.

items.name: init(validation: MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData, batchSize: Int, maximumIterations: Int, predictionWindowSize: Int, augmentationOptions: MLActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions, algorithm: MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType, targetFrameRate: Double)
items.desc: Creates a new set of training parameters for an action classifier with the validation dataset.

items.name: var maximumIterations: Int
items.desc: The largest number of training iterations the training session can use.

items.name: var batchSize: Int
items.desc: The number of videos the training session uses for each of its training iterations.

items.name: var targetFrameRate: Double
items.desc: The number of frames the training session uses per second of video to train an action classifier.

items.name: var predictionWindowSize: Int
items.desc: The number of frames the training session uses to train an action classifier.

items.name: var algorithm: MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The algorithm the training session uses to train the action classifier.

items.name: var augmentationOptions: MLActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions
items.desc: The variations the training session uses to generate more variety in the training dataset.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the model parameters shown in a playground.

items.name: enum MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: The source of a validation dataset for an action classifier.

items.name: struct MLActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions
items.desc: The video augmentations for an action classifier training session.

items.name: enum MLActionClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The action classifier training algorithm options.
